content:
# We successfully harvested 10 units of iron ore, and our inventory now includes the stone furnace, coal, stone, and iron ore.

# The next step is to use the stone furnace to smelt the iron ore into iron plates. 

# Let's check how many iron plates we can craft with the iron ore we have. Each stone furnace can smelt iron ore into iron plates, and it typically requires one iron ore and some fuel (coal in this case).

# First, I will check the current inventory before smelting.
available_inventory = inspect_inventory()
print(f"Available Inventory: {available_inventory}")

# Now, I will smelt the iron ore using the stone furnace. I will smelt all 10 units of iron ore.
smelted_iron_plates = smelt_item(Prototype.IronOre, quantity=10, furnace=Prototype.StoneFurnace, fuel=Prototype.Coal)

# Check if the smelting process was successful.
assert smelted_iron_plates == 10, f"Expected to smelt 10 iron plates, but smelted {smelted_iron_plates} instead."
print(f"Smelted {smelted_iron_plates} iron plates. Current Inventory: {inspect_inventory()}")  # Display updated inventory.
